Summary of Engineering experience 
- I have been working in Electrical Engineering Desi gn since last eighteen years. 
Started as Electrical Design Engineer in Power distributions  for petrochem, oil & gas plants. 
Moved on to work in Power Generation  for power plants designs of combined and simple cy cle 
power plants, Hydro,wind,Solar generation. Ten year s back diverted to work in Transmission and 
distribution , mainly working on AC substations  (up to 765kV) and HVDC substations . 
Holds strong electrical engineering technical leade rship in primary and secondary engineering. 
Since 2010, working in various Electrical Engineeri ng Lead Positions

quality engineering and an on time delivery track r ecorder.

as per NEC/Company policy and meeting schedule, bud get, quality, time and HSE requirements.
